summary:
Showworld Ltd is an International agency supply the best artists and entertainment suppliers.  Stephen Grindle started in 2013, prior to that the company was called DF Inc Ltd which ran for 16 years.

Stephen is also a dynamic physical theatre performer who is highly skilled in clown, mime, slapstick, improvisation,.  

Starting his career in 1985, he's had years of hands-on experience in Circus, Variety, Street, Arena entertainment, and also now Online Virtual Entertainment.

Available as:
Dingle Fingle (Award-winning multi-skilled clown).  
Baron Von Grindle (Vampire for Hire - the world's only inverted hanging vampire). 
The Clown Town Crime Watch (comedy car slapstick stunt show for all the family) 
Grindle the Butler (Comedy Butler).
Release the Clown Within (Corporate Motivational Seminar/Workshop)
Academy of Fun (Shows for learning diabled people)
Bespoke Requests. (Routines created.  Live-action direction and performance advancement, workshops).


Performance Goals: 
Internationally deliver the best entertainment/ talent that can provided, worldwide.
Create amazing entertainment concepts and spectacles.
Collaborate and work with the best people and companies!
Have a ball doing it!

Motivational Goals: 
Create space and time for people to enjoy what's happening now.
Have great teams around me. 
Excel at my vocation.

Specialties: 
Show Creation
Live action direction.
Bespoke Entertainment
Corporate Entertainment
Circus Acts
Children's Entertainment
Street Entertainment, Street Performance's, Street Show,
Meet and Greet
Mix Mingling
Slapstick clowning
Clown
Mime
Improvisation
Compare
Motivational Speaker  
Vampire
Arena displays
Driving
Stunt driving
Stunt performer
Precision driving
Learning disabled shows and workshops
Drumming
Juggling
Unicycling
Magic
Balloon Modelling
Skateboarding.
Act consultant improving/ providing acts with feedback and collaboration.

Dingle Fingle the Clown was the Winner of London 2010 Children's Entertainer of the Year.

projects.title: Frightsite Brent Cross
projects.description:
Brent Cross Shopping Centre is hosting one of London’s greatest Halloween attractions, providing a range of spooky entertainment for the half term.

On 29th, 30th and 31st October there will be chills & thrills for all ages as Frightsite Ltd provides daytime spooktastic chidren’s shows, competitions & more for children under 12 as well as a spine-tingling Zombied Circus scare attraction in the evening for adults and children aged 12 years & over. 

Lots of spooky daytime fun:

The Halloween Spooktastic Live Children’s Shows will be running at specific show times over the three days from 11am until 5pm, featuring a host of fun and games that will delight children aged from two-twelve years.

Children can also experience:

        Spooky Make ‘n Do, Craft and Arts
        Tour the Terrible Tent, where they can test their ‘he bee jeebee’ levels (no live actors are involved)
        Balloon Modeling, Face Painting, competitions & much more

A fright night of chills for real Halloween thrill seekers:

From 5pm – 11pm, thrill seekers aged 12 years & over will be able to experience entry to the never seen before ‘Dead Centre of Town, a unique Zombied Circus scare attraction. Guests can tour around the ‘Dead Centre of Town’, featuring specially trained live scare actors and special effects set inside a spooky Circus big top tent. 

All activities will be taking place at Brent Cross Shopping Centre South (NCR) Car Park, London NW4 3FP. Opposite The Brent Cross Holiday Inn on the A406 North Circular.

www.frightsite.co.uk

projects.title: Halloween at The Hub - Milton Keynes
projects.description:
Working with The Hub, supplying all entertainment for Halloween 2013. The Hub will come alive with the sights and sounds of Halloween as ghouls, zombies, hissing bats and even flame throwers pack into the piazza for the evening.

Street performers will entertain the crowds while ‘Flambe Circus’ will light up the night sky as these masterful fire artistes keep the zombies at bay as flames and sparks shoot into the darkness.

projects.title: Shrewsbury Flower Show
projects.description: Every August for more than a century the Shrewsbury Flower Show has been held in the picturesque setting of Shrewsbury’s beautiful 29-acre Quarry Park. Dingle Fingle has been providing a main arena act for a large number of years. Stephen Grindle returns each year to compare for the entire show.

projects.title: London Eye
projects.description:
Dingle Fingle facilitated a photo shoot for the London Eye Queue Line Entertainment promotion.  During Summer 2013 The London Eye chose DF Inc Ltd to roll out fantastic queue line entertainment to keep the queue lines happy and contented. Further queue line entertainment will be delivered over the Halloween period, come and see the Witch Academy from 26th October 2013! 

Entertainment provided varied from jugglers, magicians, balloon modellers, trick cyclists, to power stilts,circus workshops and much more.

projects.title: The Sooty Show
projects.description: Featured with Richard Cadell providing the use of Dingle Fingle's comedy car in 2013 for Sooty Show episode.

projects.title: Alton Towers Street Theatre Creation & Training
projects.description: Working closely with Entertainments Manager Peter Cliff,  it was my responsibility to help expand on ideas, devise, create new ideas and instruct the Street Entertainments team.  Teaching mime and physical theatre to the five street performers, who will be responsible for add hoc and impromptu shows around the park, now have a strong foundation from which to build their performances further.  It was great fun and the team is packed with talent.  Any body visiting the Towers should watch the Street Performances if they get the chance to see them.  I would love to hear your comments.

projects.title: Yas Water World Opening Ceremony
projects.description: Researched and casting of 24 International Artistes for Yas Water World opening ceremony. Worked closely with the creative genius that is Kile Ozier as creative ideas and movement director in developing the production of the opening show and formatting talent for the event and opening ceremony show under event producer extraordinaire that is Adam Proto.

contributors.last_name: Ozier - Creative Venture Catalyst - The Guy
contributors.headline: Collaborative leader|C-Suite2backstreet|Visionary creative|Strong Producer&Writer.Builds&empowers multicultural&multigenerational teams to deliver their best|Strong client rep & Audience Advocate.

projects.title: Dingle Fingle Stunt Academy
projects.description:
The Dingle Fingle Stunt Academy. A Great Slapstick Stunt Show And Slapstick Stunt Academy For Children Of All Ages.

Experience slapstick comedy techniques of the silent movie legends and silver screen stars such as Buster Keaton, Harold Lloyd and Laurel & Hardy as well as modern day clowns such as Mr Bean, Jim Carrey and Lee Evans.

Children and adults will love the hilarious cartoon style antics of these four clowns; Mr Prig, Sam Man, Tim Wit and Plug. They have accidents, like we all do, but these result in big laughs as they react, retaliate and respond by using rubber frying pans, plumbers wrenches and hammers to sort it out. No one ever gets hurt and the performers / pupils hardly lay a finger on each other.

Comedy is the name of the game and it’s fun for every one! Creating confidence for those that partake and laugher for those that spectate!

projects.title: Clown Town Flower Show
projects.description:
Featuring the World's Biggest Squirty Flower, Giant Insects and Aphids!

Devised specifically for Flower Shows, but suitable for all shows, this is another great family arena attraction. Utilising all the best concepts from The Clown Town Crime Watch Show, this slapstick flower show has a completely different story line and agenda making it ideal when two different shows are needed in the arena.

Starring Dingle Fingle as the Clown Town Gardener who has to look after the Mayor's prize flower whist he is away on business.  New on the job Dingle is unaware of the problems associated with tending to such a large bloom – i.e. the parasites, pests and bugs that want to feed off this ‘largus squiticus flowerous’.  Keen to do the job properly he enlists the audience's help to safeguard and keep a watchful eye out, of course let him know if they see any thing untoward that might be a threat to the prize flower!  Good job too because Clown Town has some huge aphids and very nasty insects that bestow themselves into battle for the flower.  Never fear Dingle FIngle is here to save the day (with the watchful eye of the audience) and return the flower back to the Mayor safe and sound at the end of the show!

20 minutes of Fun & Flower Frolics for All the Family.

projects.title: Academy of Fun - MacIntyre School
projects.description:
Created for learning disabled children but can work in any type of environment.

Many of the students Stephen has worked with have severe autism, learning disabilities, epilepsy, behavioural problems, communication difficulties, sensory impairments and may exhibit challenging behavioural activities if frightened or confused.

From his experience in this field he has developed a system of teaching children with learning difficulties that involves around action, reaction, improvisation and reward.

Using pure clown, clowning skills, mime, magic, physical theatre, improvisation and expressive therapy the students are encouraged to interact playfully, join in, learn and have fun.

The primary feature of the Clown Class is in the art of living and being in the now like there is no yesterday and no tomorrow..

Students join in, often steering the class and its activities, so what happens depends on the moment. With these moments the clown acts on what his feelings tell him to do and shares this with his audience with humorous interpretation. The clown is pure, unconcerned and unprejudiced, always paying attention to both individuals and the group as a whole whilst orchestrating the class and putting humour into whatever happens.
‘Organic Humour’ as Stephen calls it!

Every class is treated as a learning experience for everybody. There is no right or wrong. No class is ever the same.

Benefits include:

Empathy and understanding of each other abilities and qualities
Improvements; balance and hand-eye coordiation
Increased sensory acuity
Sensorial stimulation and tenderness
Being in the moment. Now!
Learning different tricks and skills
Energy through humour and laughter
Released stress
Heart to heart communication
Engagement of empathy to others
Instills confidence


Steve the Clown visits the children at the MacIntyre School on a regular basis and ensures the children have an hour of fun.

MacIntyre School is a charity close to Stephen's heart.

projects.title: The Horror Channel
projects.description:
The Baron Von Grindle Vampire added horrific thrills to the launch party of The Horror Channel.

Testimonial:
"He was absolutely fantastic!  I can honestly say that he’s the scariest thing I’ve come across at a party ever!  He fitted the Horror Channel party perfectly and clients were certainly talking about him for while afterwards. The Baron Von Grindle is definitely worth the Investment!"

Clare Dentith, Senior Marketing Manager,The Horror Channel.

projects.title: Release The Clown Within!
projects.description:
A completely original and unique Motivational Seminar equipped with all of his performing skills in clowning, mime, physical theatre, slapstick, magic, unicycling and of course a great sense of humor. He delivers in a simple to understand way why ‘Releasing the Clown Within’ can help us in communication, relationship-building, exisiting relationships, deal with fear and cope with any challenge that we are faced with.

This is a 40 minute seminar, or can be worked as workshops for half a day or a full day. It is fully customisable to suit your needs.

We can all learn from our own clown… that playful innocent learning creature that is inside us all.

Releasing the clown within equips us with the tools to help us:

- Learn and to recognise the areas in life where we get stuck. ‘Move it on!’

- Harness and understand ours and other peoples fears and positively act on them.

- Recognise our own and other peoples mistakes, mishaps, short comings.

- Monitor and act on our internal monologue and our own external physiology.

- To see the truth in our actions and not be clouded by our own self judgements.

- Be aware of past conditioning, how it effects us.

- Allow ourselves the great sense of humor to deal with the NOW!

Based on 25 years of worldwide experience, performing in one of the hardest businesses; show business. Stephen is happy to engage any audience with his message.

He will leave the audience feeling invigorated and engaged, relaxed yet alert, ready for the world!

Clients include:

The British Army ETS Branch, Avanquest, Ingram Micro, Procter & Gamble, Idea’s UK Ltd, Franklin Covey, HM Consul-General Trade and Investment.

projects.title: Zippo's Circus
projects.description:
DF Inc Ltd works together with Zippo's Circus on a regular basis to produce and set up circus shows and productions worldwide.

Dingle Fingle has shared his experience with the circus apprentices of Zippo's Festival Circus, teaching them a trick or two!

projects.title: Dingle Fingle Comedy Car Act: Clown Town Crime Watch
projects.description:
Dingle Fingle undercover policeman is out to catch Slippery Sid the classic car thief.
Slippery Sid has been selling classic cars, having rigged them to break down so he can steal them from underneath their owners' noses.
You are the Clown Town Crime Watch – Dingle Fingle needs your help…. in this all action packed show!

See the car drive by itself, witness break away doors, horns, water jets, ejector seats, explosions and smoke galore.

Featuring two mad cap stunt clowns, moving car stunts, quad stunts, drifts, donuts, precision driving and high speed crosses. Not forgetting to mention the 30 gallon water cannon! 

Join Dingle Fingle and help stop Slipper Sid once and for all.

Suitable for main arenas; Carnivals, Fete’s, Steam Rallies, Royal Shows, County Shows, Private Shows, Horse Shows, Agricultural Shows, Flower Shows.

contributors.headline: Actor/Improviser with Showstopper The Improvised Musical

projects.title: Grand Opening of Warner Brothers Theme Park Abu Dhabi
projects.description:
Showworld Ltd had the privilege of being selected to provide a group of amazing artistes to perform at the opening of Warner Brothers World, the new state of the art theme park at Yas Island in Abu Dhabi. 

Warner Brothers World cost over £1 billion dollars and was officially opened on Wednesday 25th July 2018 by Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum, the vice-president and prime minister of the United Arab Emirates, and Mohammed Bin Zayed Al Nahyan, Abu Dhabi’s crown prince. 

The Theme Park is made up of six immersive lands inspired by legendary Warner Bros. characters, with rides, shows, and attractions for everyone.
Warner Bros. Plaza 
Bedrock 
Dynamite Gulch 
Cartoon Junction 
Gotham City 
Metropolis 
Many thanks to all the Artistes and Crew of Showworld Ltd for making it a very memorable opening.

projects.title: O2. Up at the O2 Climb of the Cursed - Halloween attraction
projects.description:
One of London's newest attractions takes on a suitably scary twist this Halloween as Up At The O2 cranks up the fear factor for brave thrill-seekers. As with the regular climb over the grand O2 Arena, participants begin at 'Base Camp', which has been given an appropriately spooky renovation for the Halloween season. The story goes that in 1983, five explorers disappeared in an icy wilderness and now your job is to find out what happened to them. Along the climb, you can expect a few surprises - tricks, treats, scares and shocks - before you're given a Gothic-style map at the summit, pinpointing some of London's horror hotspots. The climbs are available from 10am to 10pm - scaling the O2 at any time is always going to be a thrill but a night-time climb will be particularly atmospheric. Children must be 10 years or above and at least 1.2 metres tall.
 
About O2 Walkway: Up At The O2

Visitors to The O2 will soon be able to see the famous domed structure from an entirely new angle - from 53-metre high Up At The O2 suspended from The O2's distinctive yellow masts. Open on 21st June 2012, the guided walk over one of London's most successful music and entertainment venues will give visitors amazing views over the great domed building designed by Rogers Stirk Harbour + Partners and beyond.

BEFORE DARK:

Experience a voyage into the unknown. Trace the steps of the Terra Ignota team safe in the knowledge that you have the tools to make your way out of any sticky situation. Perfect for families and people focussed on the climb.

AFTER DARK: THE FINAL ASCENT

Not for the faint of heart. You'll be guided across the walkway and straight into a hub of terrifying live action. This is an immersive experience with horrifying scenes and bloodcurdling screams. Can you handle it?

projects.title: Big Brother 2012
projects.description:
Big Brother House visited by Dingle Fingle!

He kissed the girl and pied the guy!

He also took his crazy clown friends along and caused mayhem and chaos for the housemates who were on a ‘no laughing task’ set by Big Brother!

contributors.name: Jem Frazer, Rob Leetham, Paul Goddard, Peter Osborne

projects.title: Pertemps Charity Ball - Circus Theme
projects.description:
DF Inc Ltd performed and supplied a full program of artistes including Dingle Fingle, the Ringmaster, contortionists, plate spinners, stiltwalkers, unicyclists, hand balancers, illusionist, magicians, jugglers, mime artistes, aerialists and fire exponents who all created an fantastic circus atmosphere from the beginning to end.

The evening was topped off by the brilliant Jasper Carrott and Bev Bevans Band who absolutely rocked the socks of them!!!

The Pertemps Charity Ball Circus Theme was a great success  celebrating Pertemps' 50 years of continued success in the recruitment business. With a happy working team of people who actively participate in life and enjoy their work and colleagues, they were a pleasure to entertain.

A huge thanks to all the excellent artistes and massive thanks to Geoff Bartlett.  who as always was great to work with on the The Pertempts Charity Ball Circus Theme.

projects.title: Rock With Laughter
projects.description:
DF Inc provided and organised all the front of house circus artistes for Zippo's Circus performing at the Rock With Laughter concert.
 
Dingle FIngle provided the clowning, also presented were silk acts, juggling and hand balancing. The job was a great success and a lot of fun!

contributors.name: Graham Norton, Jimmy Carr, Marti Pellow, Gabrielle, 10cc, Dara O Briain, Sarah Millican

projects.title: Music Video - Kate Bush: Deeper Understanding
projects.description:
Dingle Fingle stars in New Music Video:  Kate Bush - Deeper Understanding

After a six-year absence, Bush returns with a Bulgarian choir and a song about a lonely computer lover. 

Written as a conversation between a lonely person and a computer, the original clocks in at four-and-a-half minutes and features typically bombastic drum sounds, creeping synths and a Bulgarian vocal ensemble. Like many Bush songs, it has an atmosphere all of its own. The 2011 retwizzle is two minutes longer, seems to have a new vocal and, naturally for the music climate of today, a lot of vocal processing and vocoder. The chorus is much more explicitly meant to be a conversation between human and computer: "I bring you love and deeper understanding" croons the machine like a malfunctioning ZX Spectrum.

With over 30 years hands on experience in the Entertainment business Showworld Ltd is perfectly placed to give you the best event experience for your investment.
